item.title: HTML Basic
item.description: Tag <!DOCTYPE html> <html></html> <head><head> 通常是放title、meta、link、script、style的地方 <title></title> 网页的标题 <body></body> 网页的主体 <h1></h1> 标题h1-h6 <p><\p> 段落 <hr> 分割线 <br> line break <pre></pre> 这个会将里面的内容输出，空格换行等都能被显示(pre-formatted text) Attr Some suggestions you should know: HTML5 does not require lowercase attribute name, but everybody should use lowercase in HTML HTML5 does not require quotes around attribute values, but everybody should quote attribute values genaral style examples : style="font-family:arial;color:red;font-size:20px;" style="text-align:center" title: The value of the title attribute will be displayed as a tooltip when you mouse over the tag a href: usaully a link img src: image source location alt: when the image can not be displayed, it will show some text for an image html html --> lang input input --> diabled Property style background-color color //font color font-family font-size text-align //horizontal text alignment Text Formatting <b> - Bold text <strong> - Important text <i> - Italic text <em> - Emphasized text <mark> - Marked text <small> - Small text <del> - Deleted text <ins> - Inserted text <sub> - Subscript text <sup> - Superscript text
